annotations.description: Created by Abigail Gullo, now with Comp√®re Lapin in New Orleans, this Last Word variation is so named, Gullo says, because “the bubbles tickle your nose
annotations.title: The Last Laugh - PUNCH

textContent:
3/4 ounce gin
3/4 ounce green Chartreuse
3/4 ounce maraschino liqueur
3/4 lime juice
cava (champagne), to top
Garnish: lime twist

Add first four ingredients to a cocktail shaker.
Add ice, cover and shake well.
Strain into a champagne flute.
Top with cava and garnish with a lime twist.

https://punchdrink.com/recipes/the-last-laugh/
title: The Last Laugh
